name: Little Bee (pieiscool)
description:
After the death of all humans one bee remains to pollinate all the flowers on Earth. Little Bee, take flight! Little Bee cannot fight. There are no monsters. Flowers are your only friends.

Information

This was a game for the game jam A Game By Its Cover which wasn't completed on time, but I returned to finish it. It's based on this cover, which was designed by Chris Furniss.

The gameplay is very simple but actually somewhat calming. There isn't much to this game, but I hope you enjoy it!
